snippet: South and North Korea agreed to arrange for hundreds of elderly relatives separated during the Korean War to meet siblings and other family members next month.
abstract: North and South Korea agree to resume arranging reunions for relatives separated by Korean War that were halted in February 2014.
lead_paragraph: South and North Korea agreed to arrange for hundreds of elderly relatives separated during the Korean War to meet siblings and other family members next month.

headline.main: South Korea: North Agrees to Reunions
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: North Agrees to Reunions
